bwwExcerpt: Shucked is a true ensemble piece, and the cast and musicians worked wonderfully together. Robert Horn’s book brings steady pacing with whiplash one-liners, mostly from Peanut (Mike Nappi) and his frequent deep thoughts. In my attempt to stay as spoiler-free as possible, I can safely say that the verbal sparring between Lulu and Gordy was fully charged and damn near explosive.
